destinations.name: Bahamas — Atlantis Paradise Island
destinations.summary: Atlantis resort vacation. Looking for best deals on The Cove ($3300 CAD target) or The Reef ($2900-3100 CAD). All-inclusive flights + hotel.

estimatedBudget.accommodation: The Cove: $3300 CAD target | The Reef: $2900-3100 CAD target

highlights: Fine dining at Nobu, Olives, Café Martinique
Pink sand beaches of Harbour Island (day trip)
practicalNotes: The Reef = residential-style suites, family-friendly, full kitchens
Both include access to all Atlantis amenities
Watch for WestJet Vacations and Air Canada Vacations deals
Target booking window: 4-8 weeks out for best prices

destinations.name: Japan — Tokyo + Kyoto
destinations.summary: 2-week Japan trip. Tokyo for tech/food/culture, Kyoto for temples and traditional experiences.
highlights: Tsukiji outer market for sushi breakfast
practicalNotes: Get a 14-day Japan Rail Pass (~$450 CAD)
Pocket WiFi rental at airport is essential
Cash still important outside major cities

destinations.name: Iceland — Ring Road
destinations.summary: The ultimate road trip. 230km through the Canadian Rockies of Iceland. Waterfalls, glaciers, hot springs.
destinations.bestTime: June-August for midnight sun, September-March for northern lights

destinations.name: New York City Weekend
destinations.summary: Long weekend in NYC. Shows, food, museums, and just soaking in the energy.

bucketListDestinations.name: Patagonia — Torres del Paine
bucketListDestinations.why: The ultimate hiking destination. Towers, glaciers, wild landscapes at the end of the world.

bucketListDestinations.name: Morocco — Marrakech & Sahara
bucketListDestinations.why: Intense sensory experience. Markets, food, desert camping under stars.

bucketListDestinations.name: New Zealand — South Island
bucketListDestinations.why: Lord of the Rings landscapes, adventure activities, fjords.

travelPreferences.style: Solo or small group. Prefers authentic local experiences.
travelPreferences.budget: Mid-range. Will splurge on food and experiences.
